mapper.select: select a.bunyang_seq, a.ref_type, a.relation_type, a.user_id, a.user_name, a.birth_date, a.gender, a.email, a.mobile, a.phone, a.post_number, a.address1, a.address2, a.is_church_person, a.couple_seq, a.church_officer, a.diocese from TB_BUNYANG_REF_USER a WHERE a.user_name = #{userName} AND REGEXP_REPLACE(a.birth_date, '[^0-9]+', '') = #{birthDate} AND REGEXP_REPLACE(a.mobile, '[^0-9]+', '') = #{mobile} AND cancel_seq is null AND NOT EXISTS(select 1 from TB_BUNYANG_INFO bi WHERE bi.bunyang_seq = a.bunyang_seq AND (bi.progress_status in('R','E') or bi.cancel_yn = 'Y')) ORDER BY case when ref_type = 'APPLY_USER' THEN 1 when ref_type = 'USE_USER' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END LIMIT 0, 1

select a.bunyang_seq, a.ref_type, a.relation_type, a.user_id, a.user_name, a.birth_date, a.gender, a.email, a.mobile, a.phone, a.post_number, a.address1, a.address2, a.is_church_person, a.couple_seq, a.church_officer, a.diocese from TB_BUNYANG_REF_USER a INNER JOIN TB_BUNYANG_REF_USER_LOGIN b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.session_id = #{sessionId} LIMIT 0, 1

select cast((select count(1) from TB_BUNYANG_REF_USER ru WHERE ru.ref_type = 'USE_USER' and ru.bunyang_seq = a.bunyang_seq) * (case when couple_type_count > 0 then 0.5 else 1 end) as int) as required_cnt from TB_BUNYANG_INFO a where BUNYANG_SEQ = #{bunyangSeq}
